name: PersonSocialMedia
description: media (mediums) that a person uses, e.g. linkedin, twitter, whatsapp, sms, calling, and irl

platformSlug.description: medium where the person is a user

path.description: used to find the user on the platform

isPremium.description: (if available) whether or not the user has a premium account

tagline.description: (if available) a tagline for the user of the platform

bio.description: (if available) a bio for the user of the platform

typeDefinition.description: media (mediums) that a person uses, e.g. linkedin, twitter, whatsapp, sms, calling, and irl

simplifiedSchema.fullComment: media (mediums) that a person uses, e.g. linkedin, twitter, whatsapp, sms, calling, and irl

schema.fullComment:
medium where the person is a user

use this for any identifier that's not an Id-type. Usually this is a kebab-case version of a written text, but it can also be a file path, for example.

(if available) whether or not the user has a premium account
